DOC.brief_summary: AIMS & OBJECTIVES To evaluate effectiveness administer Carica folium mother tincture healthy individual 's Platelet count . Sample Details : - Students , Doctors non-teaching staff Father Muller Homoeopathic Medical College take study . A minimum 60 person select divide two group , Control & Experiment lottery method . Voluntary participation study expect . 30 person group . One group receive Carica folia mother tincture group receive placebo . Complete Blood count include platelet count measure 60 subject commence study . The drug namely Carica Folia mother tincture procure Father Muller Homoeopathic Pharmaceutical Division compile standard Homoeopathic Pharmacopeia India . Daily dosage -30 drop Carica Folia mother tincture 30 ml distilled water morning night 3days . On 4th day complete blood count include platelet count estimate 60 subject . Research Methodology Statistics : Pre & Post Control Design do . Data sample collect subject Paired 't ' test unpaired 't ' test . HYPOTHESIS : - Null hypothesis : No significant change complete blood count platelet count intervention . Alternate hypothesis : There significant variation complete blood count platelet count intervention .
